New Records: Igor Jesus made his debut for the Brazil national team ahead of the crucial World Cup qualifier against Chile
Key Match Events: Brazil made several changes to their squad due to injuries, including the surprise selection of Igor Jesus over Endrick
Pre-Game Insights: Brazil's coach Dorival Jr emphasized the importance of balancing youth and experience in the lineup ahead of the match against Chile
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was seen as a must-win for Brazil to secure their place in the 2026 World Cup
Others: The match was part of Brazil's ongoing World Cup qualification campaign, which had seen inconsistent performances
